about.title: About FarmConnect
about.subtitle: Building bridges between farmers and buyers
about.missionText: We believe every farmer deserves a fair market and every harvest deserves a home. Our platform bridges the gap between farmers, the public, and processors — creating a transparent, collaborative ecosystem that prevents waste and supports prosperity.
about.visionText: To create a world where agricultural abundance is never wasted, where farmers are fairly compensated, and where buyers have direct access to fresh, quality produce.
about.impactText: Through our platform, we've helped thousands of farmers reach new markets, reduced agricultural waste significantly, and ensured that quality produce reaches those who need it most.
about.storyText: FarmConnect was born from witnessing the challenges farmers face in finding reliable markets for their produce. We saw abundant harvests going to waste while buyers struggled to find fresh, quality products. Our solution: a digital marketplace that connects these two essential groups directly.
about.transparencyText: Open, honest dealings between all parties
about.sustainabilityText: Reducing waste and promoting eco-friendly practices
about.fairnessText: Ensuring equitable prices for farmers and buyers
